comments:
Build 20020214 team 2.0

1) I started in sync with server
2) Deleted a folder containing several files locally
3) Team->Synchronize with Stream
4) The deleted things show up as incoming creation
5) Switch to Incoming/Outgoing mode and choose "Commit"

This causes a NPE:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.CVSRemoteSyncElement.makeOutgoing(
CVSRemoteSyncElement.java:228)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.CommitSyncAction.run(CommitSyncAction.jav
a:164)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.sync.MergeAction$1.execute(MergeAction.java:10
5)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.j
ava:64)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1232)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.jav
a:78)
	at 
org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.jav
a:98)

Can't reproduce this bug. Tried the exact scenario and some other 
permutations, and commiting over the incoming addition works fine.
